name: Lost Connection (Crustyq)
description:
Description

You have lost the connection to the internet. Reconnect by reaching the Wi-Fi symbol.

Controls

R - to restart

Esc - quit the game

Arrow keys or A,D to move

Space - jump

Credits

Jump sound - dklon

Music - Snabisch

http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_noss?url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=snabisch
